text: Lasianthus gardneri is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. ==Sources== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Lasianthus gardneri. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. Category:Flora of Sri Lanka gardneri Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lasianthus gardneri
